subject: Cholesterol patients - what Dr. didn't tell you
body:
Don't Fix Your Cholesterol
By Breaking Something Else.





If you suffer from high cholesterol, your doctor has probably 

prescribed a statin medication to keep things in check. But did you know that you can take a natural alternative with no side effects?


It safely reduces cholesterol absorption by 40% or more, 

clinical tests show.










Drugs like Lipitor(r), Zocor(r), Crestor(r) and 

the other statins can cause a whole new set of problems.


That's why the most common question on our Customer Care Hotline is, "Will I be able to discontinue taking statins?"






Yes, many people have their prescriptions cut back or 

even discontinued after just a few months. So, ask your doctor if you can try the safe, natural alternative. It really works. But follow your 

doctor's advice, and don't stop taking any prescription until you get your physician's okay.




 






















You are subscribed to juuldomingoserver.net with the email address kahlia@speedy.uwaterloo.ca.
